value.latex:
Calculer l'inverse de :
$$
\left(
\begin{array}{llll}
1 & a & ... & a \\
0 & 1 & a & ... \\
... & 0 & 1 & a \\
0 & ... & 0 & 1
\end{array}
\right) ,a\in {\Rr}.
$$
value.html: Calculer l’inverse de : \[\left( \begin{array}{llll} 1 & a & ... & a \\ 0 & 1 & a & ... \\ ... & 0 & 1 & a \\ 0 & ... & 0 & 1 \end{array} \right) ,a\in {\Rr}.\]
